name: Tal Broda
bio: Head of Research Platform at OpenAI

posts.text: @HilzFuld Unfortunately, this is far from over. The IDF didn't even start to clean southern Gaza.
Accomplices should be rewarded exactly the same way as Hamas.
Don't stop until the target bank is empty.
100%. We should have never left. Now we need take it back, by force, and keep it forever. Nothing else works.
